title: Mob  Rule  GOG
description:
Title: Mob Rule
Genre: simulation / building / managerial
Released: 28th August 1999
Developer: Studio 3 Interactive
Publisher: Digital Game Factory
Description:
Get a taste of America's 'Roaring Twenties' with a bit of a gangster, godfather flavour. Take a less than serious look at the 'business' of organized crime with this hilarious game. If you fancy becoming a 'made man' and impress the Godfather with your hoodlum antics then this game will keep you glued to the screen. Deal with gangsters, murder and bribery. See how a gang war background can be cool and inoffensive at the same time, despite the violent content. Humorous undertones just won't let you take things too seriously.

Bonus content: manual, soundtrack.

How to play:
1) Run setup_mob_rule.exe and install the game;
2) Launch the game using its main executable or shortcuts (DRM free).

! Notice
If the game screen scrolls too fast, set the game executable MR.exe to run in compatibility mode for Windows 98.

If you like the game, BUY it!
